channel.title: You thought i was dead?
channel.description:
LOL, nope. Although; noticing that Mod Tharok actually became a Mod makes me a little weary of what's been going on since i've been away.
I hope everyone's Ok, still up for Japan?
And [b]IF[/b] you don't remember me, don't post, kai?
Great to be back ^___^

item.title: You thought i was dead?
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“Timothay, post:62, topic:96479”][quote author=kmB link=topic=139127.msg1401922#msg1401922 date=1180579757]

Oi guys, stop flaming timothay, he is teh hot shit

[size=1pt]end sarcasm[/size]

Wow, for a second I thought James had posted the first positive comment on these forums ever. However, I was wrong.

Ontopic: WB, I think I remember you. You were pretty active on this section, amirite?
[/quote]

Ja; pretty much. Along with Drunk On Java; although that transvestite left.

And FastBawlz, my sight is perfectly clear. Although i nearly just died two hours ago XD[/quote]

Damn… Anyone know who that guy was… I think it was like Nate… or something…

Omg what happened with Drunk On Java, he was awesome

Read full topic

[/quote]

Alot of people had stuff about you. Your one of the main reasons why i dont go on mopar anymore Because you do stuff without asking other mods first… And trying to suck up to everyone trying to get gmod. I Really do hope that you NEVER get gmod. Really do.

item.title: You thought i was dead?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

@ Taharok

Im refering to your skills overall.

Just the fact that i was developing private servers since the start?

I was there when winterlove released the 1st source.
No characters, No movement, Offline and random items each square.

I was there coding right at the start. There were 3 main open sources. Blakescape, e-scape and nixscape.

Soon after Whitefang joined with the creator of e-scape and did some major developement.
This was the era of runestatus. Perhaps the best time for private server coding as there was a great community with lots of active members all assisting each other. Whitefang kind of lost intrest around here and his source was released. Also around that time projectiles were finally released. (by phate and some one else.)

But the good era came to an end. runestatus shut down and activity dropped. Soon runestatus was reborn under the new identity “avatorium” and further developement was made. There was perhaps the largest scale project ever here. Intergrating the server seemlessly with forums.

Then avatorium went down again and i lost interst in developing for them.

There is still my public source floating around the place. Perhaps the easiest source to customize as most things can be changed through a text file so no skill was required to produce your own server. My private one had most features servers have today but built on WinterLoves second source release. Where as all the MS community does is slightly modify testscape and p16 sources.

Also dont judge people on forum posts.
Most of the progress in PS developement was done through IM, mainly irc though sometimes msn. (I know whitefang prefered MSN.)

Hmmm so do i know what i am speaking of?

I was in right from the start helping with developement. I spent hours a day helping people. I posted alot on kaitnieks, runestatus and rune-severz.

Unless you really know who you are posting about, dont post about them.

@Timothay
So sorry about spamming in your thread >.<

Read full topic
